attributes.action: Help christian churches with repairing their churches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
people who own land that is classified as rectorial land, making them lay rectors of the parish with liabilities under the Chancel Repairs Act 1932.million acres of rectoral land across England and Wales will have to foot the bill for repairs if tracked down by the church.
we believe that our government should help fund these churches as they are part of our culture and religion as some people at risk of losing their homes and resources

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
